title: Black screening during champion select.
body: Every time I try to go into champion select I get black screened and am not able to ban a champion, select my champion, select my rune page or select my masteries. I tried lower my graphics to the lowest quality and I even tried repairing the league client multiple times but nothing seems to work. I don't know what is causing this but it is preventing me from playing in most of the game modes. I could really use some help on fixing this so I can play league properly again.

replies.body: This is a recent issue that we're investigating.  At the moment, we've found that a [reinstall ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040-Reinstalling-League-of-Legends) can resolve the problem.  Let me know if that helps in the meantime!
I reinstalled the league client anf now I'm getting a message , every time I hit launch, telling me to re-install league alpha client.

Your directory may be confused in finding the files needed for the update.  Try the following navigation to fix that up.

- Navigate to your League of Legends installation folder. (Typically C:\Riot Games\League of Legends
- Scroll down until you find "LeagueClient.exe" and delete the file.
- Open the client by using "lol.launcher.admin.exe"
- Repair the client by selecting the “?” button in the top right-hand corner of the Patcher window (the first window that appears) and under the options menu, select Repair.

I hope that helps!
